title: From Expensive To Unholy, Mistakes Are 'Just My Typo'
teaser: "Sinning with the choir" is one of many errors featured in a new book called Just My Typo. NPR's Linda Wertheimer speaks with author Drummond Moir, who compiled the collection of funny misspellings.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
